text: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging.  Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.



The world has changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives.

It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made

The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made to determine if a cure existed.

However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made to determine if a cure existed. Their efforts and research had not yet gone underway when the first deaths began being recorded among the users. The deaths were in-explainable, with the user seemingly dying in their sleep. They would suddenly stop breathing, and their heart would just stop beating. Like the symptoms before, doctors were baffled on what could have caused such deaths, and were unable to stop further fatalities from concurring among the drug users. While the drug had granted them eternal youth, it seems that it had taken the ultimate price, for those that stopped aging died just like any other mortal.

This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made to determine if a cure existed. Their efforts and research had not yet gone underway when the first deaths began being recorded among the users. The deaths were in-explainable, with the user seemingly dying in their sleep. They would suddenly stop breathing, and their heart would just stop beating. Like the symptoms before, doctors were baffled on what could have caused such deaths, and were unable to stop further fatalities from concurring among the drug users. While the drug had granted them eternal youth, it seems that it had taken the ultimate price, for those that stopped aging would die just like any other person. It seemed that the drug would eventually kill the user at an undetermined time, but it was almost a guarantee on how they would die.

This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made to determine if a cure existed. Their efforts and research had not yet gone underway when the first deaths began being recorded among the users. The deaths were in-explainable, with some users seemingly dying in their sleep. They would suddenly stop breathing, and their heart would just stop beating. Like the symptoms before, doctors were baffled on what could have caused such deaths, and were unable to stop further fatalities from concurring among the drug users. While the drug had granted them eternal youth, it seems that it had taken the ultimate price, for those that stopped aging would die just like any other person. It seemed that the drug would eventually kill the user at an undetermined time, but it was almost a guarantee on how they would die. Some simply died in their sleep, others died while walking down the street, and some even went to work one day, only to die during their shift. Uncertainty faced the drug users who feared that they would die at any given time, and the possibility of death could be closer than they think.

It seemed that the drug would eventually kill the user at an undetermined time, but it was almost a guarantee on how they would die. Some simply died in their sleep, others died while walking down the street, and some even went to work one day, only to die during their shift. Uncertainty faced the drug users who feared that they would die at any given time, and the possibility of death could be closer than they think. For those that were not administered the drug, they stopped feeling envious of the youth of the drug users. They accepted their aging, feeling sympathy for those who feared their inevitable death which could happen at anytime or place.

This year, scientists after years of research finally discovers a drug that grants eternal youth to its users, making them practically live forever. The effects last a lifetime, and only one dose of the drug is needed for a person to stop aging. People all around the world are given the drug. However, the drug is monitored and only administered to people that are below the age of 20. It was determined that the effects of the drug are not suitable for those older than 20, and that they would still continue to age. Thus, many in the world still found themselves at the mercy of aging, with countless feeling jealous of those that took the drug and would keep their youth forever.

The world had changed for the better, with many now living enjoyable and carefree lives. It was a peaceful era, that would appear to last forever, just like the users that stopped aging. However, 50 years later, people in the world began to feel strange. The symptoms seemed mild at first for the user.s. They would experience mild nausea, and blurriness, with some feeling dizzy at times. Scientists and doctors concluded it was nothing too serious to worry about, and reassured people that they would be fine. Despite their reassurances, the symptoms soon began intensifying and growing in severity. For some, they experienced intense fevers, others lost sensation in different parts of the body, being paralyzed for hours on end. Many were scared of the symptoms, begging for a cure if it existed, and a treatment to ease their pain.

Ultimately scientists and experts around the world could not determine how the side effects manifested. The drug was taken off the market and further research would be made to determine if a cure existed. Their efforts and research had not yet gone underway when the first deaths began being recorded among the users. The deaths were in-explainable, with some users seemingly dying in their sleep. They would suddenly stop breathing, and their heart would just stop beating. Like the symptoms before, doctors were baffled on what could have caused such deaths, and were unable to stop further fatalities from concurring among the drug users. While the drug had granted them eternal youth, it seems that it had taken the ultimate price, for those that stopped aging would die just like any other person. It seemed that the drug would eventually kill the user at an undetermined time, but it was almost a guarantee on how they would die.
